Combat_Realism.AmmoCategoryDef.label: full metal jacket
Combat_Realism.AmmoCategoryDef.description: The soft lead core is encased in a harder metal coating, combining a medium amount of stopping power and armor penetration.

Combat_Realism.AmmoCategoryDef.label: armor-piercing
Combat_Realism.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Features a hardened steel penetrator core for increased armor penetration.

Combat_Realism.AmmoCategoryDef.label: hollow point
Combat_Realism.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A hollowed out tip causes the bullet to expand on impact, increasing tissue damage at the cost of armor penetration.

Combat_Realism.AmmoCategoryDef.label: armor-piercing discarding sabot
Combat_Realism.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Uses a discarding sabot to fire an undersized projectile at higher muzzle velocities, greatly improving armor penetration.

Combat_Realism.AmmoCategoryDef.label: armor-piercing incendiary
Combat_Realism.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with an incendiary compound that ignites on impact, doing additional damage and potentially igniting targets.

Combat_Realism.AmmoCategoryDef.label: armor-piercing high-explosive
Combat_Realism.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with high-explosives that detonate on impact for additional damage.
